Here we are, your closest teammates and helping hands:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":210394,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1de193ef-f2e8-419e-aacc-bf4c52af0484/Picture1.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1de193ef-f2e8-419e-aacc-bf4c52af0484/Picture1.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.jpg\",\"name\":\"Picture1.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1de193ef-f2e8-419e-aacc-bf4c52af0484\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":889,\"height\":509},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To dive deeper into the atmosphere of our group, we have prepared a set of interesting and a little bit weird facts about each member. Check them out by the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sway.office.com/oO3QIKsAbEl1j9sC?ref=Link\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please, don’t be scared of us after all this information :)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Waiting for your facts to be shared! \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
